title: Hybrid Disruption on Maritime Lines
narrative: A merchant vessel transiting a contested strait reports sustained GPS interference and anomalous AIS tracks. Local authorities accuse a non-state proxy; coalition partners report cyber intrusions at nearby ports. You must orchestrate maritime surveillance, synchronize information with partners, and preserve freedom of navigation while attributing effects to an actor.

dp1.stem: Initial detection: how do you prioritize immediate action?
dp1.narrative: You receive the first alert: vessel reports degraded navigation. Neighbouring states post conflicting open-source claims. Time is short and public attention is rising.

options.text: Divert vessel to nearest port for inspection and safety.
Maintain track and escalate to maritime patrols while notifying partners.
Issue a public statement attributing GPS interference to hostile actors.

dp2.stem: Attribution and partner coordination — what is your approach?
dp2.narrative: Evidence is fragmentary: cyber indicators point to a proxy group, while physical indicators are inconclusive. A coalition partner demands a public attribution.

options.text: Share intelligence privately and coordinate a synchronized response plan.
Provide a public, conditional attribution citing preliminary indicators.
Delay any attribution until technical forensics conclude.

dp3.stem: Escalation control — how do you manage tempo and coalition trust?
dp3.narrative: Partners favor a decisive show of force, but local political leaders warn that escalation could close sea lanes. Your decision affects coalition trust and mission tempo.

options.text: Conduct a coalition maritime exercise nearby to demonstrate resolve.
Issue economic and diplomatic penalties while avoiding military demonstrations.
Order a targeted interdiction of proxy logistics nodes.

reflection1_prompt: In at least 50 words, explain how your choices balanced attribution, coalition trust, and freedom of navigation. Reflect on any biases that influenced your confidence gaps.
reflection2_prompt: After reviewing debrief feedback, reflect on how you would adjust decisions to improve information advantage and trust calibration.
scenario_LO: Orchestrate coalition maritime actions to preserve information integrity and freedom of navigation under hybrid disruption.
